quotes.message: We fear our enemy but the bigger and real fear is that of a fake friend who is sweetest to your face and most vile behind your back.
quotes.name: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.message: Fake friends are like shadows: always near you at your brightest moments, but nowhere to be seen at your darkest hour True friends are like stars, you don't always see them but they are always there.
quotes.name: Habeeb Akande

quotes.message: Someone who smiles too much with you can sometime frown too much with you at your back.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: I despise the rituals of fake friendship. I wish we could just claw each other's eyes out and call it a day; instead we put on huge radiant smiles and spout compliments until our teeth hurt from the saccharine sweetness of it all.
quotes.name: Jody Gehrman

quotes.message: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smile at you is your best friend.
quotes.name: Kemmy Nola

quotes.message: It is hard to deal with someone who smiles and pretends to like you to your face and sticks that eight inch blade in your back when you turn around.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: A false friend and a shadow attend only while the sun shines.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: An honest enemy is better than a false friend. When in doubt, pay more attention to what people do and less to what they say. Actions not only speak louder than words, they are more difficult to fake.
quotes.name: Zero Dean

quotes.message: Time alone can prove the worth of friendship. As time goes by we lose the the false ones and keep the best. True friends stay when all the rest are gone.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.name: The Buddha

quotes.message: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
quotes.name: Richard Burton

quotes.message: A friend who stands with you in pressure is more valuable than a hundred ones who stand with you in pleasure.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Most people want to see you to do better, but not doing better than them.
quotes.name: London Mond

quotes.message: An honest enemy is better than a best friend who lies.
quotes.name: Vandi Tanko

quotes.message: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.
quotes.name: Sara Shepard

quotes.message: Pretend to be poor in reality and you'll notice a decrease in your friends list and request.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Fake friends are like autumn leaves, they're scattered everywhere.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: You always knew after sh— things happened, who your friends really were.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Better an honest enemy than a false friend.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after y'all not friends anymore.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: I've got more respect for someone who comes out and says they don't like me than for the ones who act like they do but talk bad about me when I'm not around.
quotes.name: Mitchell Perry

quotes.message: You got nothing to lose. You don't lose when you lose fake friends.
quotes.name: Joan Jett

quotes.message: Keep talking about me behind my back, and watch God keep blessing me in front of your face.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: I used to think enemies were the worst people in the world, but that was until I met fake friends and realized that they're a lot worse.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Better to have an enemy who slaps you in the face than a friend who stabs you in the back.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: An enemy, who is honest and shows his.her hate openly is better than a friend who is liar and putting you down secretly.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: A false friend, a friendly fraud: both are like thieves.
quotes.name: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.message: A false friend is like the shadow of a sundial.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find a good one, you must a hundred try.
quotes.name: Claude Mermet

quotes.message: To betray you must first belong. I never belonged.
quotes.name: Kim Philby

quotes.message: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
quotes.name: E.M. Forster

quotes.message: Brother, even by our mother’s dust, I charge you, do not betray me to your mirth or hate.
quotes.name: John Ford

quotes.message: In one respect indeed, our employment may be reckoned dishonest, because, like great Statesmen, we encourage those who betray their friends.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: Is it possible to succeed without any act of betrayal?
quotes.name: Jean Renoir

quotes.message: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A friendship founded on business is good deal better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: A lot of problems in the world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A person's character is shown through their actions in life NOT where they sit on Sunday.
quotes.name: Navonne Johns

quotes.message: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.name: Walter Winchell

quotes.message: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: Be yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Betray a friend and you’ll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don’t fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fake friends are like shadows: they follow you in the sun, but leave your side when in gets dark.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It’s also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
quotes.name: Paul Theroux

quotes.message: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.name: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.message: I hate two faced people, it makes it harder for me to decide which side to slap first.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If it comes, let it come. If it goes, it’s ok, let it go. Let things come and go. Stay calm, don’t let anything disturb your peace, and carry on.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: In fact a lot of problems in this world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In life, you have a choice: Bitter or Better? Choose better, forget bitter.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, can never know what true friendship means.
quotes.name: Charles Kingsley

quotes.message: It’s hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it…
quotes.name: Nicole Richie

quotes.message: Knowledge planted in truth grows in truth. Strength born of peace loses nothing to hate.
quotes.name: Aberjhani

quotes.message: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: Letting go of toxic people in your life is a big step in loving yourself.
quotes.name: Hussein Nishah

quotes.message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Lovers have a right to betray you, friends don’t.
quotes.name: Judy Holliday

quotes.message: Many people would be scared if they saw in the mirror, not their faces..but their character.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.name: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.message: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Once they stop talking to you, they start talking about you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It’ll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called 'perfection,' which will open the doors to the most important relationships you’ll ever be a part of.
quotes.name: Dan Pearce

quotes.message: Some people are going to leave, but that’s not the end your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Some people think that the truth can be hidden with a little cover-up and decoration. But as time goes by, what is true is revealed, and what is fake fades away.
quotes.name: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.message: Sometimes, you have to give up on people. Not because you don’t care but because they don’t.
quotes.name: Jennifer Green

quotes.message: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.name: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.message: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: The strong-minded rise to the challenge of their goals and dreams. The weak-minded become haters.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The worst part about success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.name: Bette Midler

quotes.message: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: This is what happens. You tell your friends your most personal secrets, and they use them against you.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: What’s the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you’re so ugly on the inside?
quotes.name: Jess C. Scott

quotes.message: You cannot always trust what you see. Even salt looks like sugar.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You don’t lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends, and you’re better for it.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale
